description: The contractor must provide data entry services on an as and when requested basis. The work will be performed in accordance with detailed specified requirements related to the information to be data captured and to technical conditions as to an acceptable error rate, security standards, turnaround time, input data, storage media to be kept until permission to destroy them is received.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**Data Capture Services**
================================

**Reference Number:** cb-6213-96181614
**Solicitation Number:** 100022969

**Publication Date:** June 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 18, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
**Expected Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2024

**Tender Summary**
---------------

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites Proposers to submit a proposal for data capture services on an "as and when requested” basis. The Contractor must provide the services in accordance with detailed specifications and technical requirements.

**Bidder Requirements**
-------------------

*   lowest cost-per-point

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The tender is open to bidders with whom Canada has a trade agreement, including:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

The tender is open to bidders with operations in Canada.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   Megan Souaid, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca, (999) 999-9999

**Attachments**
--------------

Please refer to the following documents for additional information:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6213/qa-100022969_2.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6213/100022969---amendment-1.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6213/100022969---npp---e.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6213/100022969---
